title: Kiosk Mode & Year Release
goal: Implement kiosk mode lockdown features and prepare v3.0 annual release

tasks.title: Design kiosk mode architecture
tasks.description: Design comprehensive kiosk mode with restricted navigation, disabled features, and auto-reset functionality

tasks.title: Implement kiosk mode activation system
tasks.description: Create kiosk mode manager with PIN-protected entry/exit, configuration loading, and state persistence
acceptanceCriteria: Kiosk mode activated via config or UI
PIN required to exit kiosk mode

tasks.title: Create feature lockdown system
tasks.description: Implement feature restriction based on kiosk configuration: disable file save, print, export, sharing, settings access

tasks.title: Implement navigation lockdown
tasks.description: Create navigation restrictions for kiosk mode: disable URL bar, restrict to specific documents, block external links
acceptanceCriteria: External links blocked or opened restricted

tasks.title: Create session auto-reset system
tasks.description: Implement automatic session reset after inactivity timeout, clearing annotations, form data, and returning to home screen
acceptanceCriteria: All user data cleared on reset

tasks.title: Create kiosk mode UI shell
tasks.description: Build simplified UI for kiosk mode with minimal chrome, large touch targets, and restricted toolbars
acceptanceCriteria: Minimal UI chrome in kiosk mode

tasks.title: Create kiosk configuration UI
tasks.description: Build admin interface for configuring kiosk mode settings, restrictions, and allowed documents

tasks.title: Execute comprehensive regression testing
tasks.description: Run full regression test suite covering all Phase 3 features across all supported platforms
acceptanceCriteria: All E2E tests pass on Windows, macOS, Linux
No critical or high severity issues

tasks.title: Conduct enterprise feature UAT
tasks.description: Execute user acceptance testing with enterprise beta customers for all Phase 3 Q4 features
acceptanceCriteria: LAN collaboration tested in real environment

tasks.title: Prepare v3.0 release artifacts
tasks.description: Build and sign all release artifacts: Windows MSI/EXE, macOS PKG/DMG, Linux DEB/RPM/AppImage

tasks.title: Create v3.0 release documentation
tasks.description: Write release notes, upgrade guide, enterprise deployment guide, and API changelog for v3.0
acceptanceCriteria: Release notes cover all new features

tasks.title: Deploy v3.0 to production
tasks.description: Deploy v3.0 release to production update server, website, and enterprise distribution channels

tasks.title: Post-release monitoring and hotfix readiness
tasks.description: Monitor v3.0 release metrics, error rates, and prepare hotfix process for critical issues

successCriteria: Kiosk mode provides secure public terminal experience
All Phase 3 features tested and approved
notes: Kiosk mode essential for public-facing deployments
Coordinate release with marketing and sales
